user_auth.urls module

user_auth.views module

user_auth.views.authenticate_user(request)[source]
Used in urls.py to authenticate user upon login.

Handles Http requests & redirects to user.html or back to login.html in response. If user doesn’t exist, stay at log in. If user exists, show user details view.

Parameters:

request (Any) – HttpRequest

Returns:

Redirected to view of user.html or login.html

Return type:

HttpResponse

user_auth.views.show_user(request)[source]
Used in urls.py to show user.html upon ‘user.html’ url path.

Handles Http requests & renders user.html in response.

Parameters:

request (Any) – HttpRequest

Returns:

Rendered view of user.html showing user details

Return type:

HttpResponse

user_auth.views.user_login(request)[source]
Used in urls.py to show login.html upon ‘user_auth’ url path.

Handles Http requests & renders login.html in response.

Parameters:

request (Any) – HttpRequest

Returns:

Rendered view of login.html

Return type:

HttpResponse

user_auth.views.user_signup(request)[source]
Used in urls.py to show signup upon ‘user_auth/signup.html’

Handles Http requests & redirects to login.html in response. If the form is filled correctly, details are saved and user is reversed to login. Else, render sign up form again.

Parameters:

request (Any) – HttpRequest

Returns:

Redirected to view of login.html or signup.html

Return type:

HttpResponse
